tool_description: Newsinapp is an API which allows you to add relevant news from topics into your apps.
name: newsinapp.io
title: newsinapp.io

api_list.name: List all your topics
api_list.description: Return all topics you have subscribed.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number (starting at 1) to return.

api_list.name: Retrieve latest news on a topic
api_list.description: Return latest news related to the given topic.

required_parameters.name: topic_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the desired topic.

optional_parameters.name: beforeId
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve all news after this publish id. Do not combine with 'page' parameter. * For advanced user.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number (starting at 1) to return. Do not combine with 'beforeId' parameter.

api_list.name: Search available topics
api_list.description: Return topics that match a specified query.

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: Restrict search to the given entity.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number (starting at 1) to return.

api_list.name: Retrieve latest news on all your topics
api_list.description: Return latest news related to all topics you have subscribed.

optional_parameters.name: beforeId
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve all news after this publish id. Do not combine with 'page' parameter. * For advanced user.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number (starting at 1) to return. Do not combine with 'beforeId' parameter.
